sentence.Network_en: I have come to this country to reaffirm that dedication.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这次到贵国来,就是为了重申这种献身的决心.

sentence.Network_en: He had ample opportunity to reaffirm his basic ideological commitment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾多次有机会重申他的基本思想信念.

sentence.Network_en: Oh their behalf I ask you to restate and reaffirm the timeless truth of our party.
sentence.Network_cn: 我代表他们请你们重申我们党永恒的真理.

list.abs: deteriorating conditions for aluminium meant Chalco was not prepared to build a plant , and the Queensland state government reaffirmed that there would be no mine without a refinery .铝业环境的恶化促使中铝不准备建加工厂，而昆士兰州政府重申，没有加工厂就没有开采权。

at the 2002 Johannesburg Summit , they reaffirmed that commitment and added a corresponding target to halve the proportion of people lacking access to basic sanitation by year .在2002年的约翰内斯堡首脑会议上，他们重申了这项承诺，并增加了一项相应的目标，即在同一年年底之前把缺乏基本卫生条件的人口比例也降低一半。
Though you want to reaffirm your affection for him , don ' t go too far overboard ., 虽然你想重申你对他的情 , 也不要做过了火.

less than an hour before trading began on Wall Street , President Bush reaffirmed the need for congressional action to stave off further financial upheaval .在离华尔街开市不到一小时的时候，美国总统布什重申了国会采取行动避免进一步金融动荡的必要性。

encyclopedia.content: 读音 reaffirm英音：['ri:ə'fə:m]美音：[,riə'fɝm] 词典解释 及物动词 vt. 1.再断言；再肯定；重申。 网络释义 1.重申，再断言 雅思维英语 reaffirm vt.重申，再断言。

entry.def: If you reaffirm something, you state it again clearly and firmly.

example.ex: He reaffirmed his commitment to the country's economic reform programme...
example.tran: 他重申了实施国家经济改革计划的决心。

example.ex: The government has reaffirmed that it will take any steps necessary to maintain law and order.
example.tran: 政府重申将采取一切必要措施维护法律和秩序。

sentences.sentence: "He reaffirmed his faith in the church"

auth_sentence.content: Today we reaffirm our commitment to carry this collective struggle forward.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today we reaffirm our commitment to carry this collective struggle forward.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today we reaffirm our commitment to carry this collective struggle forward.

auth_sentence.content: To keep warm and reaffirm social bonds, groups will huddle together.
auth_sentence.res_content: To keep warm and reaffirm social bonds, groups will huddle together.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To keep warm and reaffirm social bonds, groups will huddle together.

auth_sentence.content: They reaffirm their unwavering commitment to the values of respect that should govern our sport.
auth_sentence.res_content: They reaffirm their unwavering commitment to the values of respect that should govern our sport.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They reaffirm their unwavering commitment to the values of respect that should govern our sport.

sentences.en: The government reaffirmed its commitment to the peace process.
sentences.cn: 政府重申了对和平进程的支持。
